mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.title, b.content, b.hit, b.reg_date, b.user_no, u.name FROM board b, users u WHERE u.no = b.user_no AND b.no = #{no}

SELECT rn, bu.no, bu.title, bu.name, bu.hit, bu.reg_date, bu.user_no FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, b.no, b.title, u.name, b.hit, b.content, b.reg_date, b.user_no FROM board b, users u WHERE u.no = b.user_no ORDER BY b.no ASC ) bu
ORDER BY rn DESC
WHERE ( bu.name || bu.title || bu.content ) LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY rn DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES ( seq_board_no.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{user_no} )
